```lisp
(:action collect ; Collect a resource and update its state
  :parameters (?a - agent ?r - resource ?l - location)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?r ?l)
    (in ?a main_area)
    (not (collected ?r))
  )
  :effect (and
    (collected ?r)
    (not (at ?r ?l))
  )
)

(:action gather
  :parameters (?a - agent ?i - item ?l - location)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?i ?l)
    (in ?a main_area)
  )
  :effect (and
    (collected ?i)
    (not (at ?i ?l))
  )
)

(:action lay ; Lay a resource and update its state
  :parameters (?resource - object ?agent - agent)
  :precondition (and 
    (prepared ?resource) 
    (ready ?agent)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (utilized ?resource) 
    (not (prepared ?resource))
  )
)
```
